media:group.media:title: Lessons from a teenage polyglot | Tim Doner | TEDxTeen
media:group.media:description:
Tim Doner shares how becoming fluent in more than six languages offered him meaningful opportunities that went beyond broadening his vocabulary. This talk was filmed at TEDxTeen.

entry.title: Fast food? The true value of Chinese cooking | Vincent Yeow Lim | TEDxSydney

media:group.media:title: Fast food? The true value of Chinese cooking | Vincent Yeow Lim | TEDxSydney
media:group.media:description:
Vincent Yeow Lim was the kid doing his homework at one of the tables in his dad's Chinese restaurant. Now a restaurant owner himself, he asks why Chinese food is considered cheap, fast food, despite the skill required to cook it, and the long tradition and history behind it. In this talk, Vincent cooks the first dish his dad ever taught him — the simplest, but also the hardest to get right — Fried Rice.
DIMSIMLIM a.k.a Vincent Yeow Lim is a restaurant owner, chef & one of Australia’s most popular online content creators on TikTok, Instagram & YouTube. He is on a journey to showcase the true art of wok style cooking to the western world with a lil bit of YumYum. This talk was given at a TEDx event using the TED conference format but independently organized by a local community. Learn more at https://www.ted.com/tedx

entry.title: Being a Human | George Tannenbaum | TEDxLisboa

media:group.media:title: Being a Human | George Tannenbaum | TEDxLisboa
media:group.media:description: Are we being turned into machines? Speaker George Tannenbaum delivered his humanifesto and reminded us that “humans have the power and the privilege to not be machines, to not do as we’re told!” George has spent half his life in the advertising business yet he still manages to be a nice guy. Currently makes his advertising living working directly for clients and agencies. Before that, George spent five years at Ogilvy helping run his dream account: IBM. Also worked at Ogilvy on IBM. Before Ogilvy, George worked for five years as executive creative director at R/GA—running the Ameriprise business, R/GA’s first traditional-advertising account. George has also worked for some of America's most storied agencies, including Hal Riney and Partners and Ally & Gargano. George has won major awards for both creativity and effectiveness in four media channels: traditional, direct, interactive, and experiential. He's won a total of 15 Effies, including the Grand Effie and the 5/50 Sustaining Effie. He might be the only person on earth to have done that. George also writes a popular advertising blog, Ad Aged, that was called “A Most Influential Marketing Blog” by “Business Insider. This talk was given at a TEDx event using the TED conference format but independently organized by a local community. Learn more at https://www.ted.com/tedx

entry.title: Effects of nanomaterials on organisms and ecosystems | Martina Vijver | TEDxBoerhaavedistrictStudio

media:group.media:title: Effects of nanomaterials on organisms and ecosystems | Martina Vijver | TEDxBoerhaavedistrictStudio
media:group.media:description: What effects can nanomaterials have on the planet? In this talk Martina Vijver explains what her team of ecotoxicologists has discovered. Credits and thanks to: Recording studio sponsor @ University of Applied Sciences Leiden. Graphic design by Esmé Postma, Ire Oyekan and Sheila Herron. Intro music Birds by Scandinavianz | https://soundcloud.com/scandinavianz Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/deed.en_US Martina Vijver is Professor of Ecotoxicology and the first female Scientific director of the Institute of Environmental Sciences at Leiden University. Martina has extensive experience in working on the boundary of chemistry, biology and physics needed to unravel the impact of nanomaterials and chemicals to organisms, populations and communities. She is involved in various Horizon 2020 projects and has been awarded multiple prestigious research grants. In 2017 she received the international World Cultural Council prize for outspoken research and outreach activities to young students and the main public. She collaborated on writing 2 textbooks for BSc-students Environmental Toxicology (2019 online learning book), and Food and Sustainability (2019). This talk was given at a TEDx event using the TED conference format but independently organized by a local community. Learn more at https://www.ted.com/tedx

entry.title: DEĞİŞİM: GERÇEK HAYAT İÇİN | Batuhan Ulukütük | TEDxYouth@BodrumCollege

media:group.media:description: Değişimin gerçek hayata verdiği yön. Merhabalar ben Batuhan Ulukütük, 18 yaşındayım ve Eskişehirliyim. İlköğrenimimi Afyonkarahisar'da, lise öğrenimimi TED Afyon Koleji'nde tamamladım. İlgi alanlarım geniş yelpazeye yayılmakla beraber başlıca uluslararası ilişkiler, tarih ve benzeri sosyal alanlarda yoğunlaşmaktadır. This talk was given at a TEDx event using the TED conference format but independently organized by a local community. Learn more at https://www.ted.com/tedx

entry.title: L'importanza per il futuro del ritorno al rapporto attore-spettatore | FEDERICO PUPO | TEDxAsiago

media:group.media:title: L'importanza per il futuro del ritorno al rapporto attore-spettatore | FEDERICO PUPO | TEDxAsiago
media:group.media:description: La digitalizzazione e la più recente pandemia hanno progressivamente allontanato lo spettatore dagli spettacoli dal vivo. Quest'ultimo però ha un ruolo fondamentale: tra spettatore e attore si crea infatti un legame indissolubile che dura per la totalità dell’esibizione. Direttore Artistico di Asolo Musica - Veneto Musica, associazione che realizza oltre 150 manifestazioni musicali nel territorio regionale in collaborazione con il Ministero per i Beni e le Attività Culturali e con la Regione Veneto. Docente di Industria dello Spettacolo presso l’Università Ca’ Foscari di Venezia. Cavaliere dell’ordine al merito della Repubblica Italiana. This talk was given at a TEDx event using the TED conference format but independently organized by a local community. Learn more at https://www.ted.com/tedx

entry.title: You Can and You will - Be a Change Leader | Rashmi Misra | TEDxYouth@SunbeamBhagwanpur

media:group.media:title: You Can and You will - Be a Change Leader | Rashmi Misra | TEDxYouth@SunbeamBhagwanpur
media:group.media:description:
Break boundaries, live your passion and be the change.
Mrs. Rashmi Misra's shares her journey which began with a dream to educate 5 girls and is now a nation-wide movement to Educate. Empower.Transform children, women and youth. A visionary who dreams of an India where every child gets quality education, every youth gets an opportunity to prove himself, and every woman with social and economic independence. Ms. Rashmi Misra laid the foundation of VIDYA, one of India’s oldest standing NGOs with projects across the nation, transforming the lives of many. Her motto, “Educate, Empower and Transform”, truly exhibit her capacity to surmount limitations, achieve goals and become a leader of social change. This talk was given at a TEDx event using the TED conference format but independently organized by a local community. Learn more at https://www.ted.com/tedx

entry.title: NEDEN YAPAY ZEKAYI HAYATIMIZA DAHA FAZLA DAHİL ETMELİYİZ ? | Can Harma | TEDxYouth@BodrumCollege

media:group.media:title: NEDEN YAPAY ZEKAYI HAYATIMIZA DAHA FAZLA DAHİL ETMELİYİZ ? | Can Harma | TEDxYouth@BodrumCollege
media:group.media:description: Yapay zekanın hayatımızda kapladığı ve kaplayacağı yer. Merhaba, ben Can Harma. Ted Malatya Koleji'nde 9.sınıf öğrencisiyim. 2007 yılında Amerika'nın Maryland kentinde dünyaya geldim. Küçüklüğümden beri teknolojiye ilgi duymakta ve araştırmalarımı sürdürmekteyim. 2015-2016 yıllarında okulumun düzenlediği inovasyon yarışmasında ikincilik aldım. 2 kere Tübitak'a katıldım. Bir tanesinde finalistliğe kadar ilerledim. 2022 yılında da TedxBodrum'un Dönüşüm temalı organizasyonunda yer aldım. 7 senedir basketbol oynuyorum. Kış sporlarına ilgim var ve tenis dalında lisanslı bir sporcuyum. This talk was given at a TEDx event using the TED conference format but independently organized by a local community. Learn more at https://www.ted.com/tedx

entry.title: Being Gay in India | Ankit Bhuptani | TEDxYouth@SunbeamBhagwanpur

media:group.media:title: Being Gay in India | Ankit Bhuptani | TEDxYouth@SunbeamBhagwanpur
media:group.media:description: Coming out as Gay to family is challenging and on top of it, coming out as Gay to an Indian traditional family is more challenging. In this talk Ankit share his journey of coming out to his family A former TEDx Speaker, Human Rights advocate and Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) professional with 10+ years of experience in the DEI space; recognized for the “Global Diversity and Inclusion Leadership Award” (2019 and 2022) by World HRD Congress, Mr. Ankit Bhuptani has addressed UNHRC, UNSC, and UN Women on LGBT and Human Right issues. He is currently working for belonging in different areas of society through LGBTQIA+ lens. This talk was given at a TEDx event using the TED conference format but independently organized by a local community. Learn more at https://www.ted.com/tedx
